name: Silence of the Midnight Hounds
description: Hailing from the Bogs of the <Anuran Countryside>, the Silence of the Midnight Hounds are known for their skill in shadow magic. Specifically moving from shadow and shadow, smuggling goods within the shadows of clueless civilians. Now a member of a group researching the intersection of Groodu and Rootmason magics, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
